TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolTip extends System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl
.class public auto ansi ToolTip extends System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl

summary.span: 表示一个控件，该控件可创建一个弹出窗口，以便在界面中显示元素的信息。

span.span: Represents a control that creates a pop-up window that displays information for an element in the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是 ，这意味着它可以包含任何类型的单个对象 (例如字符串、图像或面板) 。A is a , which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel). 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class. 使用 控件为用户提供信息。You use a control to provide information to the user. 例如，可以使用 在中提供或的名称 。For example, you can use a to provide the name of a or a in a . 控件的内容 可能与简单文本字符串不同， 后者是包含嵌入文本和图像的更复杂内容。The content of a control can vary from a simple text string to more complex content such as a that has embedded text and images. 的内容 无法接收焦点。The content of a cannot receive focus. 控件不能有父级。A control cannot have a parent. 例如，不能将的 属性设置 为 ，而是将分配 给 和 属性。For example, you cannot set the property of a to a Instead, assign a to the and properties. 通过在中定义，可以在多个元素上使用 。You can use a on multiple elements by defining a in a . 类的属性 用于定义工具提示的位置和行为。The properties of the class are used to define the position and behavior of the tooltip. 其中的许多属性也是在类中定义的 。Many of these properties are also defined in the class. 如果其中一个属性的值由 属性和 附加属性指定，则 使用属性的值。If the value of one of these properties is specified by both the property and the attached property, the value of the property is used. 此外， 类还提供属性来设置计时行为。In addition, the class provides properties to set timing behavior. 这些附加属性不包含在类中， 但可由控件使用。These attached properties are not included in the class but can be used by the control. ## 自定义 ToolTip 控件Customizing the ToolTip Control 若要对多个控件应用相同的属性设置 ，请使用 属性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改默认值 ，为控件指定独特的外观。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 有关创建的详细信息 ，请参阅 [通过创建 System.windows.controls.controltemplate> 自定义现有控件的外观](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control). 若要查看特定于的部分和状态 ，请参阅 [工具提示样式和模板](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/tooltip-styles-and-templates)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [ToolTip Styles and Templates](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/tooltip-styles-and-templates). 此控件的依赖属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果按默认样式设置属性，则当控件出现在应用程序中时，属性可能会更改为默认值。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 默认样式取决于应用程序运行时使用的桌面主题。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [默认的 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). [!INCLUDE[setting-a-visual-property](~/includes/visual-property-note.md)] ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何定义元素的工具提示控件 。The following examples shows how to define a tooltip control for a element. 下面的示例演示如何通过将文本分配给属性来定义工具提示 。The following example shows how to define a tooltip by assigning text to the property. [!code-xaml[ToolTipSimple#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipSimple/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#1)] 下面的示例演示如何通过将对象分配给属性来定义工具提示 。The following example shows how to define a tooltip by assigning a object to the property. [!code-xaml[ToolTipSimple#ToolTip](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipSimple/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#tooltip)] 下面的示例使用代码生成一个 对象。The following example uses code to generate a object. 该示例创建一个 (`tt`) 并将其与关联 。The example creates a (`tt`) and associates it with a . [!code-csharp[ToolTipSimple#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipSimple/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ToolTipSimple#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipSimple/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于放置此 的委托处理程序方法。

span.span: Gets or sets the delegate handler method to use to position the .

value.span: 提供 的放置信息的 委托方法。

span.span: The delegate method that provides placement information for the .

value.span: 默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须将属性设置为才能 使用回调委托。The property must be set to for the callback delegate to be used. 委托返回相对于定义的可能点的数组 。The delegate returns an array of possible points that are defined with respect to the . 显示时 ，将选择一个点来最大程度地显示 可见窗口的数量。When the is displayed, a point is chosen that maximizes the amount of the window that is visible. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性并创建相应的委托。The following example shows how to set the property and create the corresponding delegate. 这一技术可由用于 ，这在 [Popup 放置示例](https://github.com/dotnet/dotnet-api-docs/tree/master/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupPositionSnippet/CS)中进行了演示。The same technique is used to by the , which is demonstrated in the [Popup Placement Sample](https://github.com/dotnet/dotnet-api-docs/tree/master/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PopupPositionSnippet/CS). [!code-csharp[ToolTipCustom#CustomPopupPlacementCallback](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipCustom/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#custompopupplacementcallback)] [!code-vb[ToolTipCustom#CustomPopupPlacementCallback](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipCustom/visualbasic/pane1.xaml.vb#custompopupplacementcallback)] [!code-csharp[ToolTipCustom#DelegateInstance](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipCustom/CSharp/Pane1.xaml.cs#delegateinstance)] [!code-vb[ToolTipCustom#DelegateInstance](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ToolTipCustom/visualbasic/pane1.xaml.vb#delegateinstance)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件打开时的方向，并指定 控件在与屏幕边界重叠时的行为。

span.span: Gets or sets the orientation of the control when it opens, and specifies how the control behaves when it overlaps screen boundaries.

value.span: 一个 枚举值，用于确定 控件打开时的方向，并指定此控件如何与屏幕边界交互。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the orientation of the control when it opens, and that specifies how the control interacts with screen boundaries.

value.span: 默认值为 。

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示打开的 是否一直保持打开状态，直到用户在鼠标不在 上时单击鼠标。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether an open remains open until the user clicks the mouse when the mouse is not over the .

value.span: 如果 一直保持打开状态，直到用户在 之外单击鼠标按钮关闭它，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the stays open until it is closed by the user clicking the mouse button outside the ; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认值为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未打开，则为属性的值 `false` 不支持 。A value of `false` for the property is not supported for a when it is not open. 若要创建在按下鼠标按钮时一直保持打开状态的工具提示，则必须将 属性和属性都设置 为 `true` 。To create a tooltip that stays open until the mouse button is pressed when it is outside the tooltip, you must set both the property and the property to `true`. 如果 `false` 工具提示未打开时设置为，则 会发生。If is set to `false` when the tooltip is not open, a occurs. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None|

exception.span: 当没有打开工具提示且 设置为 时发生。

value.span: 有关目标原点和 popup 对齐点的信息，请参阅 [Popup 放置行为](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior)。

span.span: For information about the target origin and popup alignment point, see [Popup Placement Behavior](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior).

value.span: 默认值为 0。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过设置、、、 和 属性，可以定位。You can position a by setting the , , , , and properties. 这些属性的行为与对的行为相同 。These properties behave the same as they do for a . 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Popup 放置行为](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior)。For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](/dotnet/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior). ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建和定位 。The following example shows how to create and position a .
